member.summary: The right label color getter. Default value is .

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Inspector.MetroFoldoutGroupAttribute.SideLineColorGetter

member.name: T:EasyToolKit.Inspector.MessageHandlerAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as a message handler for the message dispatcher system. Handlers are invoked when the specified message name is sent.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Inspector.MessageHandlerAttribute.MessageName
member.summary: Gets the message name that this method responds to. If null or empty, uses the method name as the message name.

member.name: P:EasyToolKit.Inspector.MessageHandlerAttribute.Priority
member.summary: Gets the priority of this handler. Higher values are invoked first. Default is 0. Handlers with the same priority are invoked in declaration order.

member.name: M:EasyToolKit.Inspector.MessageHandlerAttribute.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The message name. If null or empty, uses method name.
The priority. Higher values invoked first. Default is 0.
